name: Space Killing
description:
CONTROLS:

  • WASD or directional keys = Movement Player
  • LSHIFT = Dash
  • Number 1 = Draw weapon
  • Mouse Right Button = Secondary Shot (use it carefully, the bombs also affect the player if it’s to close)
  • Mouse Left Button = Shoot
  • Space Bar = Jump

HOW TO PLAY:

You have to beat each level by killing every enemy on the room. They come to you in waves and each one give you ten seconds to prepare your strategy. Try not to stay always in the same place, and be careful. Sometimes the enemies drops either ammo for your secondary shot or a shield that protects you from one attack.

MUSIC CREDITS:

  • Campfire Trails
  • The Contra Chop (Jim Hall)
  • Horizon Ending (Soft and Furious)
  • Powerful Stasis (Soft and Furious)

Game made by Pablo Espinàs Expósito, Eric Galàn Sola, Oriol Melo Santanà & Rubén Quiñones Trocoli
